</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

---

An alchemical fuse is a length of treated cord that can be used to time the detonation of an [alchemical bomb](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-bombs) or a stick of pyronite, or simply as a timer—at the GM's option, fuses can be used as timers to trigger other devices that can be triggered with a single appropriate action, as well.
